item.title: User contribution: Trueblocks Plotter
item.description: Matt Solomon, over at ScopeLift, used TrueBlocks as a backend to build a cool tool. TrueBlocks plotter lets you visualize and plot Ethereum data in your browser. Thanks for expanding the TrueBlocks universe!
